attributes.action: Fund family to care for terminally ill at home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think there should be money, not just 'cares allowance', which is a pittance, for Family to care for their loved ones at home. Since 2000 I have looked after my Mum, Husband, sister and most recently my Son of 27 until they passed on. there was no support or money to help, even though I myself had Cancer and struggled to know they were happy at home, with Family by their side 24 hrs a day...not easy...but worth it!
